Stronger Together.
A Louder, Collaborative Voice.
Improve Outcomes.

The Crumbl Franchise Partner Association (CFPA) unites franchise partners to share solutions, strengthen profitability, and work constructively with corporate—backed by the resources of our AAFD chapter (joined Dec 2024).

Join CFPA    See Member Benefits

About

Who We Are

CFPA is the independent, member‑led association for Crumbl franchise partners. We organize owner priorities, collaborate with corporate on data‑driven improvements, and help members operate smarter—while educating franchisees on their rights under FTC rules.

How we work

  • Member‑Led. Transparent. Action‑Oriented.
  • Volunteer board, working committees, and monthly chapter calls.
  • Issue pipeline: intake → research → member vote → proposal → follow‑up.
  • Quarterly system updates and published priorities.
  • Professional AAFD chapter management and voting tools.
Join CFPA Today

why join?

Strength in Numbers
Built on Partnership.

A Unified Voice

Speak as one for clear priorities and productive talks. CFPA organizes your input into respectful, solution-focused proposals with ongoing leadership ties—ensuring your view is amplified, not lost.

Fast-Moving Community

Tap a private Slack with operators who've solved your issues, from staffing and tech to equipment. Get answers fast, share what works, skip failures, and sustain momentum.

Data-Driven Decisions

Surveys and benchmarks surface system-wide priorities. We turn insights into trackable plans, driving smarter decisions and better outcomes. We follow data not feelings.

Legal Confidence via AAFD

Access franchise-expert attorneys, an annual consult, and optional group funds. Gain proactive rights knowledge—empowering without conflict.

Friction-Reducing Programs

Via AAFD chapter, explore health benefits, vetted partners, tools, and education to ease operations and protect margins. Leverage national scale for local impact.

Proven Impact

We've secured fairer delivery credits, improved vendor pricing, more savings options, and uniform timeline relief—guarding time and profits.

RECENT IMPACT

Progress Through Collaboration.

CFPA is the independent, member‑led association for Crumbl franchise partners. We organize owner priorities, collaborate with corporate on data‑driven improvements, and help members operate smarter—while educating franchisees on their rights under FTC rules.

Strength in Numbers. Real Results.

From playbooks to advocacy wins, CFPA helps you protect margins and make better decisions—together.

The team

Hello! This is us.

Lily Jebari

Founder

As the founder and CEO of Wrap, and as an interactions and visual design specialist, she knows that user- centred and easy-to-use design is an essential way to distinguish a good product and an awesome product.

Mark Wayne

Creative Director

Mark started designing web sites back in 1992. Since then, he has worked for a wide range of digital agencies in the UK and America. At Wrap, Mark’s role means solving all kinds of visual design problems.

Clare Watson

Front-end Developer

Clare is a senior front-end developer here at Wrap, specialises in building blocks of the web: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. She has almost ten years experiencs in the front-end development.

Jone Bucan

Senior Designer

Jone started designing web sites back in 1992. Since then, he has worked for a wide range of digital agencies in the UK and America. At Wrap, Jone’s role means solving all kinds of visual design problems.
